title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Building the Future Trading Platform leveraging AI and AWS (AIM3307)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用AI和AWS构建未来交易平台 (AIM3307)
abstract: LPL Financial is one of the fastest growing Broker Dealers, with an aim to grow their client base exponentially leading them to build a future ready Trading Platform. To build a futuristic Trading platform, know how can they integrate advanced technologies like artificial intelligence (AI), leverage microservices and cloud infrastructure, and plan for disruptive innovations. A modular, globally-focused Trading Platform that simplifies complex workflows will be critical to staying competitive in this Era of AI. The platform building adopts futuristics vision ensuring Scalability, Stability and resilience. This presentation is brought to you by Cognizant, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: LPL Financial是增长最快的经纪交易商之一，旨在指数级增长其客户群，这促使他们构建面向未来的交易平台。为了构建未来主义交易平台，了解如何集成人工智能(AI)等先进技术、利用微服务和云基础设施，并规划颠覆性创新。模块化、全球化的交易平台能够简化复杂工作流程，这对于在AI时代保持竞争力至关重要。平台构建采用未来主义愿景，确保可扩展性、稳定性和弹性。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Cognizant为您呈现。
